item.title: 这只独角兽正在挑战 Adobe。它能飞吗？
item.description:
澳大利亚Canva公司在预期的首次公开募股之前押注人工智能，以促进增长。【原文：

Australia’s Canva bets on AI to turbocharge growth ahead of an anticipated IPO.

】

item.title: 交易员提升美联储押注，11 月缩表规模被视为两难选择
item.description: 关于美联储 11 月降息预期幅度的争论愈演愈烈，随着官员们开始权衡下一步行动，交易员们加大了与央行降息路径有关的期货赌注。【原文：The debate over the magnitude of the Federal Reserve’s expected interest-rate cut in November is intensifying, with traders ramping up wagers in futures keyed to the central bank’s path as officials start to weigh in on their next move.】

item.title: 巴西经纪指南》在 Safra 交易后裁员约 50 人
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，巴西经纪公司 Guide Investimentos 在被贷款公司 Banco Safra 收购仅几周后，就解雇了约 50 名员工。【原文：Brazilian brokerage firm Guide Investimentos has dismissed about 50 employees just a few weeks after being acquired by lender Banco Safra, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 大型科技软件供应商 Carahsoft 在弗吉尼亚州遭到联邦调查局突袭
item.description: 两名熟悉内情的人士称，联邦特工周二搜查了为政府机构提供技术产品的主要分销商 Carahsoft Technology Corp.【原文：Federal agents on Tuesday searched the Washington-area offices of Carahsoft Technology Corp., a major distributor of technology products to government agencies, two people familiar with the matter said, asking not to be identified because the information isn’t public.】

item.title: 穆迪将纽约州高速公路评级提升一级
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）将纽约州高速公路（New York State Thruway）的信用等级提高了一个等级，这是一条连接纽约市和水牛城的 570 英里收费公路，穆迪评级公司认为该公路的债务状况日益确定，而且去年 9 月批准了增加收费。【原文：The New York State Thruway, a 570-mile toll road connecting New York City to Buffalo, had its credit rating raised one-notch by Moody’s Ratings, which cited increasing certainty of its debt profile and a toll increase approved last September.】

item.title: 卡罗琳-埃里森在 FTX 案件中被判入狱两年
item.description: 卡罗琳-埃里森（Caroline Ellison）因在 FTX 倒闭案中扮演的角色而被联邦法官判处 24 个月监禁，并被勒令没收 110 亿美元，尽管她帮助检察官将她的前老板兼男友山姆-班克曼-弗里德（Sam Bankman-Fried）定罪。【原文：Caroline Ellison was sentenced to 24 months in prison and ordered to forfeit $11 billion by a federal judge for her role in the FTX collapse, despite helping prosecutors in the conviction of Sam Bankman-Fried, her former boss and boyfriend.】

item.title: Diamondback 和 Kinetik 与 Epic Crude 达成 30% 股权交易协议
item.description: Diamondback Energy, Inc. 和 Kinetik Holdings Inc. 共同收购了 Epic Midstream 旗下管道运营商 Epic Crude 30% 的股权。【原文：Diamondback Energy, Inc. and Kinetik Holdings Inc. together acquired a 30% equity stake in Epic Crude, the pipeline operator that’s a unit of Epic Midstream.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织总裁称美国通胀形势 "良好"，美联储 "做对了
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）总裁表示，美国经济有望实现软着陆，因为货币政策抑制了通胀，但并未使经济陷入衰退。【原文：The US economy looks on track for a soft landing as monetary policy cooled inflation without tipping the economy into recession, according to the chief of the International Monetary Fund, who also credited the world’s biggest economy for helping support global growth as other nations slowed.】

item.title: Blue Owl牵头Smartsheet收购私募债务交易
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，Blue Owl Capital Inc. 主导了 32 亿美元的私人债务融资，支持 Blackstone Inc. 和 Vista Equity Partners 对软件公司 Smartsheet Inc.【原文：Blue Owl Capital Inc. led the $3.2 billion private debt financing supporting Blackstone Inc. and Vista Equity Partners’ buyout of software firm Smartsheet Inc., with 20 other lenders participating, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美国领导的集团考虑资助更多矿产项目以对抗中国的主导地位
item.description: 一个由美国牵头的国家联盟正在考虑利用一个融资网络为更多的矿产项目提供资金，旨在打击中国在金属供应链中的主导地位。【原文：A US-led coalition of countries is looking at funding more minerals projects using a financing network aimed at combating China’s dominance of metal supply chains.】

item.title: 全球最不受喜爱的大型银行股上涨 37%，但未获买入评级
item.description: 股票分析师似乎搞不懂澳大利亚联邦银行。【原文：Equity analysts can’t seem to figure out Commonwealth Bank of Australia.】

item.title: CrowdStrike 高管就大规模故障向国会道歉
item.description: 周二，网络安全公司 CrowdStrike Holdings Inc. 的一位高管在国会听证会上就一次灾难性的内容更新导致全球数百万台电脑崩溃一事道歉。【原文：A senior executive for cybersecurity firm CrowdStrike Holdings Inc. apologized at a Congressional hearing on Tuesday for a disastrous content update that crashed millions of computers around the world.】

item.title: 穆迪下调阿拉斯加航空公司评级至 "垃圾 "级，原因是计划增加借款
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）周二发表声明，下调了阿拉斯加航空集团公司（Alaska Air Group Inc）的信用等级，因为该公司表示计划发行担保债务，为夏威夷控股公司（Hawaiian Holdings Inc）的债务再融资。【原文：Moody’s Ratings cut the credit grade of Alaska Air Group Inc after the company said it plans to issue secured debt to refinance Hawaiian Holdings Inc debt, according to a statement on Tuesday.】

item.title: 期权交易商扎堆押注刺激政策后中国股市反弹
item.description: 在中国央行宣布大规模刺激计划后，投资者加大了对中国股市复苏的押注，抢购美国交易证券的看涨期权。【原文：Investors added to bets on a recovery in Chinese shares, snapping up bullish options on US-traded securities after the country’s central bank announced a massive stimulus package.】

item.title: 2023 年雪佛龙向非洲国家石油公司支付的费用将超过向美国支付的费用
item.description: 雪佛龙公司在 2023 年向尼日利亚、安哥拉和赤道几内亚支付了 62.5 亿美元的税款并分享了石油产量，是该公司向美国政府支付的税款的三倍。【原文：Chevron Corp. paid $6.25 billion in taxes and shared oil production to Nigeria, Angola, and Equatorial Guinea in 2023, three times more than the company paid to the US government.】

item.title: 帕洛阿尔托女子独家学校借贷 1.06 亿美元建造校园
item.description: 卡斯蒂利亚学校基金会正在市政债券市场上借款，寻求获得 1.06 亿美元的资金，用于改造这所拥有 127 年历史的私立女子学校的校园。【原文：Castilleja School Foundation is borrowing in the municipal bond market, seeking $106 million to upgrade the campus of the 127-year-old private school for girls and young women.】

item.title: OpenAI 向所有付费 ChatGPT 用户推出新语音助手
item.description:
这家初创公司此前推迟了该功能的推出，以解决潜在的安全问题。【原文：

The startup previously delayed the feature to work through potential safety issues.  

】

item.title: 贝莱德加密货币主管米特尼克认为比特币是 "风险厌恶型 "资产
item.description: 尽管比特币近期与美国股票价格走势高度相关，但贝莱德公司的数字资产主管表示，将加密货币称为 "风险 "资产很可能名不副实。【原文：Even though Bitcoin has been highly correlated as of late with the price moves of US equities, BlackRock Inc.’s head of digital assets says its a likely misnomer to call the cryptocurrency a “risk-on” asset.】

item.title: 欧佩克秘书长在巴西的演讲被抗议者打断
item.description: 欧佩克秘书长海瑟姆-盖斯在巴西的演讲一开始就不顺利，因为讲台停电，一名抗议者走上台。【原文：OPEC Secretary-General Haitham Al-Ghais’s speech in Brazil got off to a rough start after the power went out to the podium and a protester took to the stage.】

item.title: 因业绩和成本疲软，S&P 将 CVC 支持的立顿茶进一步降至 "垃圾 "评级
item.description: S&P全球评级公司（S&P Global Ratings）将立顿茶叶和饮料（Lipton Teas and Infusions）母公司的评级下调至垃圾级，原因是该茶叶生产商的业绩低于预期。【原文：S&P Global Ratings downgraded the parent company of Lipton Teas and Infusions deeper into junk, flagging weaker-than-anticipated performance from the tea manufacturer.】

item.title: 早期积冰使东北极地区与受制裁的俄罗斯液化天然气隔绝
item.description: 俄罗斯批准的北极液化天然气 2 号项目还有不到一个月的时间将液化天然气货物穿过北海航线运往亚洲，而在此之前，这条通道将关闭，油轮只能在明年夏天才能通过。【原文：Russia’s sanctioned Arctic LNG 2 project has less than a month left to send liquefied-gas cargoes across the Northern Sea Route toward Asia before the passage closes down for its tankers until next summer.】

item.title: 温哥华港谷物工人在收获季节罢工
item.description: 周二，加拿大最大港口的谷物工人因工时和工资纠纷举行罢工，这被一个行业协会称为在收获季节将给农民带来 "毁灭性 "的局面。【原文：Grain workers at Canada’s biggest port went on strike Tuesday over a dispute regarding hours and pay, setting up what an industry association called a “devastating” situation for farmers during the harvest season.】

item.title: 量化 ETF 为沃尔夫兑现研究成果提供了新途径
item.description: 另一家华尔街卖方研究公司正寻求进军 ETF 领域，这次是主动管理型量化基金。【原文：Another Wall Street sell-side research firm is looking to make inroads into the ETF world — this time with actively managed quant funds.】

item.title: 欧佩克加倍下调不受约束的石油需求增长预测
item.description: 欧佩克（OPEC）对全球石油需求将持续增长到本世纪中叶的预测加倍下调，科学家称这种离经叛道的观点将导致气候灾难。【原文：OPEC doubled down on forecasts that global oil demand will keep growing to the middle of the century, an outlier view that scientists say would lead to climate catastrophe.】

item.title: 马克莱姆对通胀率重返目标感到高兴，但希望核心政策更加宽松
item.description: 加拿大央行行长蒂夫-马克莱姆（Tiff Macklem）表示，他很高兴通胀率回到了央行 2% 的目标，但他希望看到核心指标和住房价格更加宽松。【原文：Bank of Canada Governor Tiff Macklem said he’s pleased inflation is back to the central bank’s 2% target but he wants to see more easing in core measures and shelter prices.】

item.title: SunPower 获准出售业务以完成 Solaria 项目
item.description: SunPower 公司已获得破产法院批准，以 4500 万美元的价格将其太阳能电池板业务出售给竞争对手 Complete Solaria 公司。【原文：SunPower Corp. has won bankruptcy court approval to sell its solar panel business to rival Complete Solaria Inc. for $45 million.】

item.title: Meta 将在新法律出台前拒绝欧盟的人工智能安全自愿承诺
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司拒绝接受欧盟的人工智能安全自愿承诺，该承诺是欧盟人工智能法案规则于 2027 年全面生效前的一项权宜之计。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. is spurning the European Union’s voluntary artificial intelligence safety pledge that’s planned as a stopgap measure before the bloc’s AI Act rules take full force in 2027.】

item.title: 高盛集团的科斯汀预计明年 S&P 500 指数将达到 6000 点大关
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：The runway is clear for the stock market to keep powering higher once the US presidential election is decided, says Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s David Kostin.】

item.title: 德国央行行长纳格尔称德国经济将再次提速
item.description: 德国联邦银行行长约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，随着德国经济近期疲软的几个原因被证明是短暂的，德国经济可能会加快步伐。【原文：Germany’s economy is likely to gather pace as several of the causes behind its recent weakness prove short-lived, according to Bundesbank President Joachim Nagel.】

item.title: 降息概率上升，美国两年期收益率拍卖前下跌
item.description: 周二，短期国债收益率下跌，接近年内最低水平，因为消费者信心指数的疲软增强了美联储下月再次降息半个百分点的理由。【原文：Short-dated Treasury yields fell Tuesday, approaching their lowest levels of the year, as weakness in a gauge of consumer confidence strengthened the case for another half-point interest-rate cut by the Federal Reserve next month.】
